name: Casino Zombino
description:
GameJam submission

WASD - Move Character

Lmb - Attack

The Zombino Casino customers got turned into zombies, and it's up to you to take care of them.

Survive for 10 minutes to win.

Zombies spawn in increasingly faster waves.

The dice rolls every 15 seconds and switches your current weapon.

Pickups randomly spawn, and if picked up they roll the dice to switch your weapon.

Every 50 kills a health pickup spawns that can refill some health.

Credits:

Robin Meekel

Thijs Hoogenbosch

Jesse Bijma
